data.title: Stephen King married 50 years today
data.meta_description:
Stephen King and wife Tabitha (also a writer) have been married for 50 years today.
Their son Joe writes under the pen name Joe Hill. Source: Reddit
data.text:
Love all of his work.

Stephen King, earned my respect from the get-go, courtesy of a story I read about him. He had started rolling the dough in and had bought himself a fancy car, but not wanting to come across as flaunting his newfound wealth, he left his new car at home and drove his old jalopy to the get-together.

Now that's my kind of people.

I wonder what it’s like being married to him. He comes up with such bizarre, scarey, stories that I just wonder what he is like on a day to day basis. Apparently he’s pretty darn nice if they have been married 50 years!

His wife Tabitha is also an author of the bizarre. She has a number of books out there.
